parts.annotation: A specialized cell transmitting nerve impulses; a nerve cell. Neurons are the basic building blocks of the nervous system. They are cells that are specialized to process information. They can communicate with other neurons and with other types of cells like muscle cells. Neurons are the core components of the brain and spinal cord of the central nervous system, and of the ganglia of the peripheral nervous system.

title: The Blank Slate
author: Steven Pinker
content: The Blank Slate is a book that talks about the nature vs. nurture debate. The author, Steven Pinker, argues that human behavior is not solely determined by genetics but is also influenced by environmental factors.

parts.content: The Blank Slate theory, attributed to
John Locke
, posits that humans are born without inherent traits, shaped entirely by
social influences
and experiences, challenging the notion of inherent nature.

The Noble Savage theory suggests that humans are inherently good and that society corrupts them, while the Ghost in the Machine theory posits that humans have a soul or spirit that transcends the physical body.
Human nature has been subject to three main but faulty theories: the Blank Slate, Noble Savage, and Ghost in the Machine, each reflecting different philosophical perspectives over the centuries.
Pinker argues that all three theories are flawed and that human behavior is a complex interplay of genetics, environment, and culture.
